{{velocity}} #set($xaction = "$!{request.getParameter('xaction')}") This application allows to replace a field value for an object of a document by a new chosen value, on a selection of the wikis from the farm. #if($xaction == '') {{html}}
Properties that designate metadata of the document can be used such as "doc.content". In this case, the class will not be used.
Checking this box will create the target object (of the target class), if not already present in the target document.
Does not apply for the document metadata properties, such as doc.content.
